#summary Distortion and noise experiment program

= WWDistortionNoise =

WWDistortionNoise is my personal distortion and noise experiment program.

Currently jitter adding function and gain adjustment function are implemented.

Screenshot

http://bitspersampleconv2.googlecode.com/files/WWDistortionNoise101SS.png

Output data spectrum

http://bitspersampleconv2.googlecode.com/files/JitterAdded.png

= System Requirements =

 * Windows 8 x64, Windows 7 x64 or Windows Vista x64
 * 8GB or more memory
